metadata.title: CVE-2024-27834 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in iOS17.5 and iPadOS 17.5, tvOS 17.5, Safari 17.5, watchOS 10.5, macOS Sonoma14.5. An attacker with arbitrary read and write capability may be able tobypass Pointer Authentication.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
